    • Uses of Location in game

      Methods in game with parameters of type Location 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Corpse.tick​(Location currentLocation)
      This method overrides the tick method from Item class and is called in every turn, in this case it tracks the turns a Corpse is created and reanimate the corpse if the conditions are met.
      void Corpse.tick​(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)
      This method overrides the tick method from Item class and is called in every turn if an actor is carrying the Corpse, and the corpse will be removed and a new Zombie will be created at a random adjacent location to the actor if the conditions are met.
      void Crop.tick​(Location location)
      This method overrides the tick method from Corpse class and is called in every turn, in this case it increments the ripeTurns each time the method is called, and the display character will be changed if ripeTurns more than or equals 20 to represent that a crop is ripe
      void Shotgun.tick​(Location currentLocation)  
      void Shotgun.tick​(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)  
      void ShotgunAmmunitionBox.tick​(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)
      If ammunition box is in inventory, remove the ammuniton box and add to the total shotgun ammunition the player is carrying.
      void SniperAmmunitionBox.tick​(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)
      If ammunition box is in inventory, remove the ammuniton box and add to the total sniper ammunition the player is carrying.
      void SniperRifle.tick​(Location currentLocation)  
      void SniperRifle.tick​(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)
      The tick method is used to determine whether the concentration of an actor holding the sniper rifle is broken.
      void Tree.tick​(Location location)  
      void ZombieArm.tick​(Location currentLocation)  
      void ZombieArm.tick​(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)  
      void ZombieLeg.tick​(Location currentLocation)
